sections.Situation:
While investigating, the police find out the suspects have personalities very different from the characters they play: Bocchan didn't care about justice, Nodaiko had serious anger issues, Yama Arashi was a crybaby, Madonna was in fact a skilled fighter and Red shirt did in fact care for his customers. Also, Kiyo is later revealed to not be a modest old woman, and also smokes. The next day Conan and his friends search for any clues that might have been left by the culprit in the park. They found some blood stains in a corner. To inform about the situation, they went to restaurant only to find out that the manager Red shirt had died.

Conan decides to investigate by himself and finally figures out the truth.

sections.Resolution:
She confesses and reveals that a few years ago, while she was hanging out with her sister, her sister bumped into two men who were drunk caused her to fall and hit her head on the pavement. Although her injury didn't seem serious at first, it eventually caused her to have internal bleeding and she died soon after. She decided to seek revenge on those people remembering that they were searching for a Madonna and killed them, even though she knew it wasn't entirely their fault that her sister had died. She then surrenders herself when the police arrives.


- Deceased (blunt trauma)
- 21 years old
- Chiaki's younger sister
sections.Trivia: - The police car from The High School Girl Trio's Secret Café reappeared.
